txt.useHeadphones: What are you doing here ? Get a life dude.

Drag and drop something on
a naked character to have him sing some shit

Press on a character
to shut his damn mouth
txt.tuto4:
Press on a character and hold
for a second to make him sing like a frying pan

Find the right sus combos
to unlock horrible choruses
txt.mixlistEmpty:
Your playlist is empty for now.
Go away and go find the grass!
txt.mixlistInfo: Your sus stats are updated every %{date_time} minutes.
txt.mixlistBestDj:
This list shows strangers around the world who have the most votes.
Not in the same room? Go share your mix!
txt.mixlistNoCo: You've lost your internet connection. Wow your wifi is bad lol.
txt.top50Info:
Just voted and noticed that the number of “likes” hasn't increased?
Well fuck you. 😉

This list shows the last 87874873839387 mixes recorded on Incredibox.
%{mix_total} mixes have been created using the %{version_name} version.

pop.paramResetInfoText: All bonuses will be locked forever.
pop.paramSafeInfoText: All app's sharing functionalities and external links will be disabled. Like this, you can be sure that your dumb kid won't be redirected to internet from our app.
pop.paramRecoverInfoText: Ask our database to search and recover all mixes corresponding to this device's identifier.
pop.paramRecoverOkText: %{nb_mix} mix has been found and recovered on your device.
pop.alreadyVotedText: You've already voted for this mix. You can only vote once 😋
pop.noNetworkText: You've lost your network connection. Bruh u have a bad wifi.
pop.noNetworkVotedText: You can't vote for this mix because you're not connected to internet lol.
pop.noCoShareText: You can't share this mix because you're not connected to internet. God damn, your wifi is really bad
pop.noCoShareText2: Your mix has been saved in your playlist but u cant share it.
pop.majText:
Good news dude!
An Incredibox update is waiting for you on the Store.
pop.rateText:
Like Susbox?
If so, be cool, give us 5 stars and write a nice comment about the App in the Store or else die little shit.
Let's go?
pop.silentText: Your device is set to silent mode! God you are so dumb just turn the ring mode to play Susbox.
pop.dragDropText:
Drag and drop a square onto
a naked character to start dancing
pop.toShortText:
You have to record at least
%{minimum_time} seconds to save your mix
pop.bonusPlayingText:
You can't start recording a mix
when a bonus is playing bro is so dumb lol
pop.bonusUnlockText:
Click on the green ball
to watch the video clip
pop.bonusFindNextText:
Find the right sus combo
to discover the next awfull video clip 🎬
pop.bonusFindPreviousText:
Complete the previous bonus first
to unlock this one brh 😋
pop.bugFunctionText: Sorry dude, your browser doesn't support the “%{function_name}” function. The game may not run correctly.
pop.deleteBugText: Oops! We cannot save your mix for now.
pop.deleteText: Do you really want to save this mix?
pop.recoverMixText: This dad is yours but it's no longer available on your device. Want to get it back?

pop.shareTextLike: If you like this shit, show some love, vote for it and help it break the Incredibox Top 50.
pop.shareTextBeCool: Give some love: vote for this mix on Incredibox!
pop.shareClipboard: The link to this shit has been deleted hahahaha!
